h2_title: Where to use the Skandha of Form in Black Myth: Wukong
content: Defeating this boss with the Four Skandhas in your inventory will give you the Skandha of Consciousness. With all five Skandhas, you can visit Xu Dog in Yellow Wind Ridge and show him the Skandhas. In return, he will give you the Five Skandhas Pill - a big upgrade to your health, mana, and stamina.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Skandha_of_Form.md', within the main section titled 'Skandha of Form', specifically from the subsection 'Where to use the Skandha of Form in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
Defeating this boss with the Four Skandhas in your inventory will give you the Skandha of Consciousness. With all five Skandhas, you can visit Xu Dog in Yellow Wind Ridge and show him the Skandhas. In return, he will give you the Five Skandhas Pill - a big upgrade to your health, mana, and stamina.
